content.text: Bitcoin's current price is $101,746 with a market cap of $2,016,865,086,833. It experiences a significant daily decline of -$2,958.15.
Ethereum's current price stands at $3,204.93 with a market cap of $386,200,269,910. The daily change is marked at -$124.62.
Solana is priced at $236.59 with a market cap of $115,121,580,274. It sees a daily change of -$19.40.
ai16z coin is at $0.7352 with a market cap of $808,758,429. Notably, its daily change reflects a downturn of -16.21%.
The APRO plugin is integrated to support new functionalities like querying coin prices, agent registration, and data verification.
An update to the MultiversX Plugin introduces access token management. It allows limitation of token management to specific user(s).
Solana web3.js V2 and automated liquidity providing on Orca are made operational, offering a streamlined user experience in the Solana ecosystem.
BTC.Fun Plugin launched, allowing users to create and trade Runes/BRC20 tokens on Bitcoin network, enhancing interaction and functionalities.
Deribit integration comes into play, now part of the Eliza platform allowing institutional level market commentary and data interaction.
New policies regarding application management on platforms like Replit indicate compatibility issues with Node 23 as currently Replit supports Node 20 only.
Excitement rises as season 2 begins in linked discussions and engagements, indicating active community participation.
Several applications have poured in for the Aiccelerate Builders incubator cohort, showing significant traction in their first initiative.
Discussions related to AI development broaden as scenarios showcase how bootlegged AI models are competing with high-profile AI labs.
